sentences.sContent: Will you please compare the adverb “well”?
sentences.sCn: 请你说出副词“well”的原级、比较级和最高级好吗?

sentences.sContent: In the class, the professor taught the students how to use an adverb in the sentence.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the class, the professor taught the students how to use an adverb in the sentence.
sentences.sCn: 在课堂上，教授教学生们如何在一个句子里用副词。

sentences.sContent: For our purposes, we get the definition of a word as well as its pronunciation and type (for example, adjective, noun, verb, adverb).
sentences.sContent_eng: For our purposes, we get the definition of a word as well as its pronunciation and type (for example, adjective, noun, verb, adverb).
sentences.sCn: 我们这里只涉及到词汇的定义、音标和词性（如形容词、名词、动词、副词等）。

trans.tranOther: a word that adds to the meaning of a verb, an adjective, another adverb, or a whole sentence, such as ‘slowly’ in ‘He ran slowly’, ‘very’ in ‘It’s very hot’, or ‘naturally’ in ‘Naturally, we want you to come.’
